synopsis.text: After witnessing the exhilarating spectacle of cheerleading during her middle school years, the ever-helpful and enthusiastic Kohane Hatoya is captivated by the sport. Upon entering high school, she is disheartened to find no cheerleading club, but takes it upon herself to establish one. With her best friend, the reliable Uki Sawatari, and the skilled yet reluctant ex-cheerleader Hizume Arima by her side, Kohane embarks on a journey to overcome her fear of heights and create a cheerleading squad that radiates positivity and support for all. Join this spirited trio as they navigate the challenges of high school and cheerleading in this uplifting tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
